# netbird_dns_zone (Resource)

Create and manage custom DNS zones. See [NetBird Docs](https://docs.netbird.io/manage/dns/custom-zones) for more information.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "netbird_dns_zone" "internal" {
  name                 = "internal-zone"
  domain               = "internal.company.com"
  enabled              = true
  enable_search_domain = true
  distribution_groups  = [netbird_group.example.id]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain` (String) Zone domain (FQDN)
- `name` (String) DNS Zone name identifier

### Optional

- `distribution_groups` (Set of String) Group IDs that define groups of peers that will resolve this zone
- `enable_search_domain` (Boolean) Enable this zone as a search domain
- `enabled` (Boolean) DNS Zone status

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) DNS Zone ID

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import netbird_group.example group_id

# For example

terraform import netbird_group.example cvi609bl0ubs73ask10g
```
